content: embrace the cozy vibes of fall with this charming collection of chunky crochet pumpkin patterns this set includes three handy sizes small medium and large allowing you to create cute stuffed pumpkins worked from the bottom up in the round the standout crochet knit rib stitch replicates the snug feel of 1x1 knit ribbing delivering a textured authentic pumpkin appearance using bulky yarn these projects come together swiftly and simply ideal for novice crafters or experienced makers seeking a fun fast make standout features creative stitch method master the effortless one-round repeat crochet knit rib stitch yielding a ribbed effect that s elastic and easy to work with flexible sizing options simple formula for tweaking dimensions with various yarn weights bonus video resources access links to helpful video guides for the stitch and completing your pumpkins
